summary: Project focused on deploying an app through draft and production release stages.
architectural_notes: Establish a release workflow with at least two environments/stages: Draft (review) and Production (live).

existing_features.title: Promote the currently deployed draft release (Draft Version 2) to the production environment so the production deployment serves the same app functionality as the reviewed draft.

Run a pre-production verification pass covering backend canister availability and frontend API connectivity to ensure the production frontend can query the Motoko actor methods used by the UI (e.g., getCatalogGames, getCatalogGame, getGames, getGame, getItems, getItem, getItemsByCategory, getUpdateStatus).

new_feature_requests.summary: Support deploying a draft build/version for review
Support promoting/deploying the reviewed draft to production

projectName: Promote the currently deployed draft to production
